item.description:
My principles Link to heading

I care deeply about equality.

This is a value I defend with conviction because I believe itâ€™s the foundation of a strong society, something that stands apart from the randomness of nature. Nature distributes opportunities unevenly, but promoting equality helps us level the playing field and give everyone a fair chance to thrive.

I also believe equality is essential for a peaceful society. When inequality is too great, it leads to problems like violence, crime, and poverty. By working toward more fairness, we can ease these issues and create a better environment for everyone.

Transition Ecologique des Entreprise : Highlighting state support to encourage ecological actions in SMEs Link to heading

This project was launched within the beta-gouv ecosystem in 2023. I joined as a freelance developer in the spring of 2024, primarily taking charge of the backend and data management aspects of the project.

The goal of the initiative is to support small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in their ecological transition. By showcasing the financial and logistical support provided by the State, we create an appealing entry point that allows us to offer these businesses practical solutions for reducing their environmental impact.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
If you have a question on a specific project, the best way to get my attention is to open a github issue in the relevant repository.

If you are not a github user or for anything else, feel free to contact me at : thibaut.tezenas(at)protonmail.com
